messages.content: Hi, I went to a park and I set on a bench. I didn't notice that my wallet felt. A man came to me from behind giving me back my wallet.
Thats a sweet man, I hope you acknowledged his kind gesture.
Yes, I did. I was so grateful because I have a lot of money in my wallet.
Their aren't that many well rounded people in the world these days so when you see one you should always show appreciation!
